summary: 3 punk loving dudes in NYC need a change and drive a VW Beetle to California. After rednecks kill one of them in Arizona, they want justice. A cute girl helps them.
cast: Jon Cryer|Daniel Roebuck|Flea|Lee Ving|Billy Ray Sharkey|Glenn Withrow|Michael Melvin|Marc Rude|Catherine Mary Stewart|Cal Bartlett|Pete Willcox|Vance Colvig Jr.|Ancel Cook|Wycliffe Young|Red Wing|Christina Beck|Molly Matthiesen|Read Morgan|John Densmore|Pamela Gidley|Peter Kent|Leland Sun|Tiny Wells|David K. Wolf|Judy Starr|Marcia Darroch|Jan Ackerman|Joe Escalante|Warren Fitzgerald|Dave Quackenbush|The Vandals|Helen Kelly|Blessing McAnlis
keywords: punk|revenge|title directed by female|punk rock|road trip
title: Los tachuelas
